title: Production-Grade Face Verification with NID
excerpt: Designing and deploying a high-accuracy face verification system leveraging custom AI models and datasets, optimized for real-time performance and scalable inference.

title: Excel-Integrated NLP Chatbot
excerpt: Building an AI-powered chatbot that interacts with Excel datasets, providing automated responses and insights using natural language processing pipelines.

title: Custom Speech Recognition from Conversations
excerpt: Developed a real-time speech recognition system for conversational data, training custom NLP and audio models to achieve high accuracy in diverse environments.

title: AI-Based Fire Detection with Surveillance Cameras
excerpt: Implemented a computer vision pipeline for fire detection using surveillance cameras, integrating AI inference into real-time monitoring systems for safety-critical applications.

title: AI-Powered Accident Detection System
excerpt: Designed and deployed an accident detection system using AI, integrating real-time camera feeds with alerting mechanisms for enhanced road safety.
